alert.note: Alert for Gallatin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 12 at 4:07AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt continues. * WHERE...Portions of central and southwest Montana, including the following counties, in central Montana, Meagher. In southwest Montana, Gallatin. * WHEN...Until 600 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 406 AM MDT, Emergency management reported flooding in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... White Sulphur Springs, Ringling, Lennep, Newlan Creek Reservoir, Checkerboard, Martinsdale, Fort Logan and Fort Logan On The Smith River. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
